name: SRAmbientLightSample.SensorPlacement
desc: Directional values that describe light-source location with respect to the sensor.

items.name: case frontBottom
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the bottom of the sensor.

items.name: case frontBottomLeft
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the bottom-left of the sensor.

items.name: case frontBottomRight
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the bottom-right of the sensor.

items.name: case frontLeft
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the left of the sensor.

items.name: case frontRight
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the right of the sensor.

items.name: case frontTop
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the top of the sensor.

items.name: case frontTopLeft
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the top-left of the sensor.

items.name: case frontTopRight
items.desc: Indicates that the light source is toward the top-right of the sensor.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: Indicates that the sensor can't determine the light sourceâ€™s location.
